document_data.mainbody:
emerity was a tiefling descendant of the Toril thirteen.
Temerity ran a shop in Proskur.
In 1478 DR, Farideh and Lorcan went to Temeritys shop. Lorcan asked for Temeritys assistance for his plan. However, Temerity had made a pact with Sairch√© and informed her of the presence of Farideh and Lorcan in the city.
Temerity had made a warlocks pact with Lorcan but later transferred to Sairche.
